Immortal (Ad Vitam) (2004)
Immortel (ad vitam) (original title)
 103 min  -  Animation | Action | Crime  -   24 March 2004 (Belgium)
5.9 Your rating:    -/10   Ratings: 5.9/10 from 13,243 users   
Reviews: 160 user | 67 critic
In the distant future, Earth is occupied by ancient gods and genetically altered humans. When a god is sentenced to death he seeks a new human host and a woman to bear his child.

Director: Enki Bilal
Writers: Enki Bilal (comic books "La Foire aux immortels" and "La Femme piĂ¨ge"), Serge Lehman
Stars: Linda Hardy, Thomas Kretschmann and Charlotte Rampling | See full cast and crew
